associatedPollutants.implicitMarginofSafetyText: The MOS for sediment is implicitly applied from the MOS included in the TP target
associatedPollutants.TMDLEndPointText: Primary target = 252 tons/year sediment in-lake accumulation; Secondary target = Secchi disk depth between 0.81 - 0.70 meters

associatedPollutants.explicitMarginofSafetyText: Expressed as 10 percent decrease in WQ target
associatedPollutants.TMDLEndPointText: Primary target = 50 ug/L TP growing season average (45 ug/L with the MOS); Secondary target = chlorophyl-a between 10 - 25 ug/L
